embeddium.plus.options.blueband.desc: Когда отключено, убирает синюю полосу во всех измерениях
embeddium.plus.options.blueband.title: Синяя полоса на небе
embeddium.plus.options.culling.entity.de: Когда включено, сущности будут исчезать из обзора при определённых значениях границы дальности
embeddium.plus.options.culling.entity.di: Hides and does not tick entities beyond this many blocks. Huge performance increase, especially around modded farms.
Hides and does not tick entities underneath this many blocks, improving performance above caves. This should ideally be set lower than the horizontal distance.
embeddium.plus.options.culling.tile.dist: Hides block entities beyond this many blocks. Huge performance increase, especially around lots of modded machines.

Hides block entities underneath this many blocks, improving performance above caves (if you have your machines in caves, for some reason). This should ideally be set lower than the horizontal distance.
embeddium.plus.options.culling.tiles.des: If enabled, Block Entities will be hidden based on configured distance limit
embeddium.plus.options.darkness.blocklig: If enabled, Disables sky, fog and moon brightness, making blocks as a only source of light
embeddium.plus.options.darkness.end.brig: Configure fog brightness in the End when darkness is enabled.
embeddium.plus.options.darkness.end.desc: If enabled, true darkness will be applied in the End.
embeddium.plus.options.darkness.mode.des:
Makes the rest of the world more realistically dark. Does not effect daytime or torch light.
Controls how dark is considered true darkness.
embeddium.plus.options.darkness.moonphas: If enabled, Darkness will be affected by Moon Phases
Configure brightness on a new moon, or minimal bright level on black moon phase
Configure brightness on a full moon, or maximum bright level on black moon phase
embeddium.plus.options.darkness.nether.b: Configure fog brightness in the Nether when darkness is enabled.
embeddium.plus.options.darkness.nether.d: If enabled, true darkness will be applied in the Nether.
embeddium.plus.options.darkness.noskylig: If enabled, true darkness will be applied on dimensions without skylight
embeddium.plus.options.darkness.others.d:
If enabled, true darkness will be applied in other dimensions

[WARNING] This option will be removed in a near future in favor of a blacklist
embeddium.plus.options.darkness.overworl: If enabled, true darkness will be applied in the Overworld.
embeddium.plus.options.displayfps.desc: Отображает текущий FPS. В расширенном режиме также отображает минимальный FPS, а также средний FPS за 15 секунд, что полезно для оценки производительности.
embeddium.plus.options.displayfps.gravit: Место, где будет отображаться количество FPS
embeddium.plus.options.displayfps.shadow: Добавить теневое поле к отображению FPS, в стиле F3
embeddium.plus.options.displayfps.system: Отображает использование памяти и GPU рядом с счётчиком FPS
embeddium.plus.options.displayfps.title: Показывать FPS
embeddium.plus.options.dynlights.speed.d:
Controls how often dynamic lights will update.

Lighting recalculation can be expensive, so slower values will give better performance.
embeddium.plus.options.dynlights.tiles.d:
If enabled, dynamic lighting will be showed on tile entities (furnaces, modded machines, etc).

This can drastically increase the amount of lighting updates, even when you're not around furnaces
embeddium.plus.options.fadein.desc: Controls how fast chunks fade in. No performance hit, Fancy simply takes longer, but looks a bit cooler. Currently not working
embeddium.plus.options.fadein.title: Chunk Fade In Quality
embeddium.plus.options.fastbeds.desc:
If enabled, replaces dynamic bed model with a static model, like a normal block. Increases performance and also let you use custom models with resource packs
IMPORTANT: enabling/disabling it requires also enabling/disabling resourcepack
embeddium.plus.options.fastbeds.title: Использовать оптимизированные кровати
embeddium.plus.options.fastchest.desc:
If enabled, replaces chests model with a static model, like a normal block. Breaks chest animation but goes more faster on chest rooms

Option has no effects with flywheel installed and running batching or instancing backend
IMPORTANT: enabling/disabling it requires also enabling/disabling resourcepack
embeddium.plus.options.fastchest.title: Использовать оптимизированные сундуки
embeddium.plus.options.fog.desc: Если отключено, убирает эффект тумана только в обычном мире
embeddium.plus.options.fog.title: Использовать туман
embeddium.plus.options.fontshadow.desc:
If disabled, text will stop rendering shadows giving a flat style.
Increases FPS depending of how much text is on the screen, specially with BetterF3 mods
embeddium.plus.options.fontshadow.title: Тень текста
embeddium.plus.options.jei.desc: If enabled, JEI/REI/EMI item list will be hidden unless you search for something. Press space to search for everything.
embeddium.plus.options.jei.title: Hide JEI/REI/EMI Until Searching
embeddium.plus.options.nametag.disable_r:
Do not show me your name!
Disables nametag rendering for players and entities
embeddium.plus.options.others.languagesc: Когда включено, смена языка будет вызывать лишь обновление языковых файлов заместо всех ресурсов, что в 99.9% случаях ускоряет смену языка
embeddium.plus.options.screen.desc:
Windowed - the game will display in a small window.
Borderless - the game will be fullscreened, and locked to your monitor's refresh rate, but allow you to tab out easily.
Fullscreen - the game will display in native fullscreen mode.
embeddium.plus.options.screen.title: Полноэкранный режим
embeddium.plus.options.zoom.cinematic.de:
Enable Cinematic Camera while zooming.
If you disable this, you should also try setting `zoomSmoothnessMs` to `0`
embeddium.plus.options.zoom.desc:
If `true`, the mod will be disabled (on some platforms, key binds will still show in game options; they won't do anything if this is set to `true`).
Requires re-launch to take effect.
embeddium.plus.options.zoom.easing_expon:
The exponent used for easing animations.
You should probably leave this at the default if you don't understand what it does.

The exponent used for making differences in FOV more uniform.
You should probably leave this at the default if you don't understand what it does.
embeddium.plus.options.zoom.max.title: Maximum FOV
embeddium.plus.options.zoom.min.title: Minimum FOV
embeddium.plus.options.zoom.scrolling.de:
Allows you to zoom in and out by scrolling up and down on your mouse while zoom is active.
This will prevent you from scrolling through your hotbar while zooming if enabled.
embeddium.plus.options.zoom.sensitive.de:
Mouse Sensitivity will not be reduced below this amount while zoomed in.
Set to `1.0` to prevent it from being changed at all (not recommended without `enableCinematicZoom`).
embeddium.plus.options.zoom.smoothness.d:
FOV changes will be spread out over this many milliseconds.
Set to `0` to disable animations.
embeddium.plus.options.zoom.speed.desc:
Speed for Zoom In/Out key binds & zoom scrolling (if enabled).
DEFAULT: `20`
embeddium.plus.options.zoom.speed.title: Скорость приближения
embeddium.plus.options.zoom.third_person:
Maximum third-person zoom distance (in blocks).
Set to `0.0` to disable third-person zoom.

Minimum third-person zoom distance (in blocks).
Set to `4.0` to mimic vanilla.
embeddium.plus.options.zoom.title: Включить приближение
embeddium.plus.options.zoom.toggle.desc:
If `true`, the Zoom keybind will act as a toggle in first-person.
If `false`, Zoom will only be active in first-person while the keybind is held.
embeddium.plus.options.zoom.toggle.third:
If `true`, the Zoom keybind will act as a toggle in third-person.
If `false`, Zoom will only be active in third-person while the keybind is held.
embeddium.plus.options.zoom.toggle.title: Переключить режим
